reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress fits well below the knees and is well-made, with one noting it's thick enough for cold weather layering. The dress is comfortable without being see-through, and customers find it flattering, particularly on curves, with one mentioning it shows off the figure well. They appreciate the soft material and color, with one customer noting it works well with their skin tone. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress.
items.body: Love this coffee color dress, true to size. I got a size small and fits me perfectly, I am 5'3" 120 lbs. Made well and good quality. Bought another one in black. Read more
items.author: VW

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and comfortable
items.body: I am 5'4" and 110#. I usually wear a XS/S. After reading reviews, I ordered this in a XS. I should have gotten the S. To be fair, the dress fits well, but it's too tight for my preference. I have long arms and usually struggle with sleeves being too short. These sleeves fit well. The length of the dress hits ~2" below my knees. The material is very comfortable, thick enough that it's not see through, but not too heavy. I could wear a cardigan over it. I ordered the wine color and it is as shown in the photos. I got this dress during a sale and paid $34.19. While the quality of this dress is nice, I don't think I would pay the full price of $53. Read more
items.author: CSG

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best sweater dress
items.body: This sweater dress is perfect! The fit and fabric quality was amazing. No see through issues. I would have given 5 stars except the color was more pumpkin than caramel. Read more
items.author: TamCos

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous
items.body: I’ve had this dress for a while about 2, almost 3 years and it’s been a reliable go to every time I want to look nice. It’s figure hugging but the length of it and the fact that it’s a turtle neck makes it look effortlessly elegant and classy. However, the sleeves have always been too short for my arms. Beautiful nonetheless Read more
items.author: Hannah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous sweater dress
items.body: The fit is perfect. It’s lighter weight than I thought but I love how it fits and the length is great too! The color is nice and is a true brown. Read more
items.author: TWood

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Significantly too small
items.body: It’s a great dress, love the fabric and design. The problem is that it runs extremely small. I can’t emphasize that enough. My daughter is small. Usually between a 4 and an 8 in women’s sizes. So I got her the small (6-8) per the mfg. The dress doesn’t even come close. Im going to re-order but I’m getting her a large and I hope it works. Read more
items.author: JenLevine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft material and beautiful color
items.body: Love this dress!!! Beautiful color and super soft and comfortable!!! Read more
items.author: Brea Shay Politte

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic fit!
items.body: I was not expecting a dress of this quality and fit at such a great price. I highly recommend it especially for petites! Read more
items.author: Janny

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Black, Coffee, Orange, Camel Color, Navy, Plum, Khaki, Pink, White, Caramel, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
